screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .camtemplate file in TechSmith Camtasia 2023
screenshot.caption: CAMTEMPLATE file open in TechSmith Camtasia 2023

description: Camtasia is available for Windows and macOS and allows you to create various screen-capture videos, such as tutorials, video game recordings, and demonstrations. The software comes with templates, but you can download templates from TechSmith's online library or create your own.

To create a CAMTEMPLATE file with Camtasia, open a project, then select File → Save Project as Template or Export → Template... (macOS version only). After exporting a template, you can share it with other Camtasia users, who can import it into their projects.
